channel.title: Lost my save game file after Windows reinstall, can somebody help?
channel.description: Hi, can someone please share there save game files for the current black mesa source version? I just want to start a new game at the chapter where I left off.

item.title: Lost my save game file after Windows reinstall, can somebody help?
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
BOSSHELB:

This is for steam right?
I too lost my save files (at the last level at that!).
Where do I enter “sv_unlockedchapters #,” ?

Open the console by pressing the tilde (~) key, then type it in there and hit enter.

If pressing ~ doesn’t open the console, go into options, controls, advanced, and tick enable developer console.

Read full topic
item.source: Lost my save game file after Windows reinstall, can somebody help?

item.title: Lost my save game file after Windows reinstall, can somebody help?

Had to do this myself after reinstalling Black Mesa, had to get all the achievements again too

item.title: Lost my save game file after Windows reinstall, can somebody help?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Open the console, “sv_unlockedchapters #,” and replace the # with about how many chapters you were into the game.
